reviews.text: been there a few times , they helped throw my sister a 30th birthday that came out so nice and we all had alot of fun , the food was delicious , drinks were beautiful and presented sooo nice ! definitely will be going back again. the bar tenders are so sweet .

This place is a hidden gem of deliciousness. The food and drinks are made with the greatest care and it shows! Great place to catch a game, sit at the bar and have a well crafted drink! Best chicharrones and guacamole you have ever eaten. Carlos is an incredible bartender, highly knowledgeable and so friendly! His drinks were so good!! Definitely check this place out!! You will love it!!

Every time I come to this place I had such a great time! The atmosphere was fun and welcoming, and the drinks were on point. A special shout out to Carlos, the bartenders. He was super friendly, attentive, and made amazing recommendations. You can tell he really cares about making sure everyone has a good experience. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back, and I highly recommend asking for Carlos when you visit!

Great food and drinks, excellent service!! Thank you Daysi!!
Great food and friendly service. Will be going back

I stopped by El Patr√≥n Sports Bar & Grill and had a fantastic time. Service was excellent across the board. Our bartender Stephanie deserves a special shout-out for her friendly attitude and quick service. I would definitely come back again!
Amazing experience, nice place to go and relax after work. Food and everything else was good. Always looking forward to good customer service, look for Daysi super nice!
Great place to go with friends, we had a good time, Daysi is a sweetheart best service ever!
Really nice environment and was given a great service by one of the employees named Daysi.
Excellent food and excellent service. Stephanie is amazing behind the bar, very friendly and attentive. Her hospitality alone has turned me into a regular customer ! Highly recommend !
This place was great to sit and watch the any sporting event that is on, the wings, the service and attention was phenomenal

Hi let me tell you about El Patron This place is popping and its very nice in the interior. Service is great food and drinks are the bomb . Loved everything.i recommend it best place!!!
Went there with my girlfriend twice in the passed two weeks! Great food and drinks! The bartender Carlos makes very good drinks and hookah is always on point.

Loved this place went with my mom & one of my best friends! Hookah was perfect, the guacamole was great & the drinks were even better! Great service! Beautiful place & Carlos was very attentive, easy to talk to, & recommended the best drinks! Will be going back soon for a girls night.
